message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $9,500. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product and am willing to pay $9,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,000 is too low for me. How about we settle at $9,250?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $9,100 for the product.
